info.brief_description: 17 year old Jeff gets more than he bargained for when he is hired to babysit!
info.description:
This is a Shrinking Fetish Interactive. All characters are purely fictional and therefore if anyone has an issue with the content, feel free to leave. The Two main characters are:

Jeff: 17 year old male,6'2, short black hair and in good shape for his age. He decided to babysit his neighbour's kid and watch their house for the weekend for some extra cash as he is currently on summer break from school, even though he thinks watching a 14 year old girl a little odd, surely she's old enough to take care of herself?

Becky: 14 year old female, 5'2, red hair, F Cup. She's a short girl with abnormally large breasts for her age and size and loves it. She is annoyed that her parents hired you to babysit her when she can handle herself just fine. She has recently discovered a 'little' trick by snapping her fingers that no one knows about.. Yet.

I will be personally be adding chapters to this story through the first branch but will add reader's choice paths for others if you would like to add. Will award Gp for decent adds. This is my first interactive and I hope it does well. Good Luck and Have fun Shrinking!
